title: Garen mains are the most delusional lot I've ever seen
body:
"garen is balanced"

"his q is hard to hit"

"e is easy to get out of"

"dot dmg"

"ult has long CD"

"outplayed XP"

"zhonya's outplay boom!"

"garen is hard to 1v5 with"

"cant beleive i got that penta"

"what is my luck, always end up getting fed"

"#outsustained"

Garen mains will often say these bullshit lines thinking they're cool and good a this game when in truth they're just a bunch of freelo abusers, blazing off to diamond 1.
